transitions.blink: variable.is_blinking = 0; variable.return_from_blink = query.life_time + math.random(0, 0.2); variable.last_blink_time = variable.last_blink_time ? variable.last_blink_time : query.life_time; return query.life_time > (variable.last_blink_time + math.random(3, 40));

transitions.default: variable.is_blinking = 1; variable.last_blink_time = query.life_time; return query.all_animations_finished && (query.life_time > variable.return_from_blink);
